info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:38AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Steuben, east central Elkhart, northeastern Noble, northern De Kalb, Lagrange, southeastern St. Joseph, southern Branch and southwestern Hillsdale Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 737 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Lagrange, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Angola around 755 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hamilton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 333 and 357. Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 115 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
